subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Crystal
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I thought I heard them say that the 13th was special yesterday, but it 
wasn't very clear, that's why I wanted to do a session today. so once again 
I don't know if it's the change in echo box, or conditions.

Frank


>From: Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...>

>
>Well now thats just not fair!! My gf Crystal strikes again. She has a big 
>mouth LOL. I was only "looking" at coming out that way for a visit I didnt 
>make any plans yet. I looked at many places of interest near friends is she 
>gonna go tell all of them too? LOL and yeah Ive been getting alot of 
>overtime in lately. What a blabbermouth hehehe
>
>   Misty
>
>Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
>           These are from using a larger echo box wiht #13, not the one I 
>was making
>tonight, this box is made out of wood, I made it last year. The voices are
>copied off the tape as I back up(rewind) the tape, and kind of "feel" where
>to stop and copy segments to the computer. A "trick" I find more useful 
>that
>going form front to back.
